name: The Great Car Maze
description:
Welcome to The Great Car Maze, this game was created for KrassJam. This pacman style dodge the parking ticket game is due to the theme of "An arcade game where you avoid tokens to unlock bonus items."

The controls are simple, you have a choice of arrow keys or WASD to move, you could even use the analog stick on an Xbox controller if you wanted. 

Story: You were running from the cops for not having a back number plate but forgot to pay for a parking ticket when you stopped at Tesco. You need to get back to your house without collecting any parking tickets!

SEE HOW MANY LEVELS YOU CAN GET THROUGH!
